benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: PUT /1.0/kb/admin/payments/{paymentId}/transactions/{paymentTransactionId} - Update existing paymentTransaction and associated payment state

covered: Successful update of payment transaction and payment state (TC01)
Update with missing required header X-Killbill-CreatedBy (TC03)
Update with inconsistent or invalid state data (TC08)
Attempt update when payment and transaction tables are empty (TC12)
Update with maximum allowed field values (TC14)
Update with minimum allowed/empty field values (TC15)
Update with slow backend or dependency timeout (TC16)
Regression testing for previous problematic states (TC20)
Update when dependent service is degraded (TC22)
Partial input with only required fields (TC23)
Whitespace or case variations in headers (TC26)
gaps: No explicit tests for handling of unsupported or extra query parameters beyond TC25.
Limited coverage of rate limiting/throttling scenarios.
No specific tests for caching headers or cache validation.
Lack of explicit tests for concurrency conflicts beyond TC17.
No tests explicitly cover system behavior under backend service degradation or retries.
recommendations: Add tests for pagination handling if applicable.
Include explicit authorization and permission validation tests.
Implement rate limiting and throttling tests.
Add scenarios testing cache headers and validation.
Expand concurrency conflict testing with more complex race conditions.
Include tests simulating backend service failures and retries.
